description.0: A jade pendant formed by piecing together two jade stones.

0.0: Defeating an opponent increases Movement SPD and ATK by <cryo>12%</cryo> for 15s.

1.0: Defeating an opponent increases Movement SPD and ATK by <cryo>14%</cryo> for 15s.

2.0: Defeating an opponent increases Movement SPD and ATK by <cryo>16%</cryo> for 15s.

3.0: Defeating an opponent increases Movement SPD and ATK by <cryo>18%</cryo> for 15s.

4.0: Defeating an opponent increases Movement SPD and ATK by <cryo>20%</cryo> for 15s.
